name: Desogestrel prescribed as a branded product
title: Prescribing of branded desogestrel
compared with prescribing of all desogestrel
description: Total quantity of branded desogestrel as a proportion of total quantity of all desogestrel.
why_it_matters: ~~Desogestrel is available as both generic tablets and as a number of brands.~~
~~For a time some of these brands were cheaper than the generic tablets, so CCGs started to use them. ~~
~~However the price of the generic has now fallen and is the cheapest option to prescribe.~~
As of December 2023 this measure has been retired, due to changes in the desogestrel market. We will be deleting links to this measure shortly.
